channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Parity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Parity

item.title: CVE-2017-14460|2024-09-17T02:11:42.400Z -- talos -- parity
item.description: An exploitable overly permissive cross-domain (CORS) whitelist vulnerability exists in JSON-RPC of Parity Ethereum client version 1.7.8. An automatically sent JSON object to JSON-RPC endpoint can trigger this vulnerability. A victim needs to visit a malicious website to trigger this vulnerability.
